item.title: Nick add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "When I write, I feel like an armless, legless man with a crayon in his mouth." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Nick add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Nick add a quote by William Faulkner
item.description: "When the shadow of the sash appeared on the curtains it was between seven and eight o' clock and then I was in time again, hearing the watch. It was Grandfather's and when Father gave it to me he said I give you the mausoleum of all hope and desire; it's rather excruciating-ly apt that you will use it to gain the reducto absurdum of all human experience which can fit your individual needs no better than it fitted his or his father's. I give it to you not that you may remember time, but that you might forget it now and then for a moment and not spend all your breath trying to conquer it. Because no battle is ever won he said. They are not even fought. The field only reveals to man his own folly and despair, and victory is an illusion of philosophers and fools." -- William Faulkner

item.title: Nick add a quote by Ursula K. LeGuin
item.description: "What sane person could live in this world and not be crazy?" -- Ursula K. LeGuin

item.title: Nick add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Nick add a quote by Philip K. Dick
item.description: "It is sometimes an appropriate response to reality to go insane." -- Philip K. Dick

item.title: Nick add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Here is a lesson in creative writing. First rule: Do not use semicolons. They are transvestite hermaphrodites representing absolutely nothing. All they do is show you've been to college." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Nick add a quote by Jessamyn West
item.description: "Fiction reveals truth that reality obscures." -- Jessamyn West

item.title: Nick add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Jazz isn't dead. It just smells funny." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Nick add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "Great things are not accomplished by those who yield to trends and fads and popular opinion." -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: Nick add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "I was a victim of a series of accidents, as are we all." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Nick add a quote by Arthur C. Clarke
item.description:
"My favourite definition of an intellectual: 'Someone who has been educated beyond his/her intelligence.
[<i>Sources and Acknowledgements</i>: Chapter 19]" -- Arthur C. Clarke

item.title: Nick add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Nick add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Nick add a quote by Michael Dorris
item.description: "Don't ask so many questions and they will all be answered." -- Michael Dorris

item.title: Nick add a quote by Yukio Mishima
item.description: "True beauty is something that attacks, overpowers, robs, and finally destroys." -- Yukio Mishima

item.title: Nick add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "When you start to live outside yourself, it's all dangerous." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Nick add a quote by Edward Albee
item.description: "I write to find out what I'm talking about." -- Edward Albee

item.title: Nick add a quote by Donald Miller
item.description:
"I never liked jazz music because jazz music doesn't resolve. But I was outside the Bagdad Theater in Portland one night when I saw a man playing the saxophone. I stood there for fifteen minutes, and he never opened his eyes.
After that I liked jazz music.
Sometimes you have to watch somebody love something before you can love it yourself. It is as if they are showing you the way.
I used to not like God because God didn't resolve. But that was before any of this happened." -- Donald Miller

item.title: Nick add a quote by Charlie Parker
item.description: "Music is your own experience, your thoughts, your wisdom. If you don't live it, it won't come out of your horn. They teach you that music has boundaries. But, man, there's no boundary line to art." -- Charlie Parker

item.title: Nick add a quote by Eudora Welty
item.description: "Long before I wrote stories, I listened for stories. Listening for them is something more acute than listening to them. I suppose itâ€™s an early form of participation in what goes on. Listening children know stories are there. When their elders sit and begin, children are just waiting and hoping for one to come out, like a mouse from its hole." -- Eudora Welty

item.title: Nick add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "I can't imagine a man really enjoying a book and reading it only once." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Nick add a quote by Joyce Carol Oates
item.description: "A daydreamer is prepared for most things." -- Joyce Carol Oates

item.title: Nick add a quote by Harlan Ellison
item.description: "You are not entitled to your opinion. You are entitled to your <i>informed</i> opinion. No one is entitled to be ignorant." -- Harlan Ellison

item.title: Nick add a quote by William Faulkner
item.description: "...only the peak feels so sound and stable that the beginning of the falling is hidden for a little while..." -- William Faulkner

item.title: Nick add a quote by Sam Shepard
item.description: "I had a definite sense of somehow being a passenger in an evil vehicle crusing through Paradise." -- Sam Shepard

item.title: Nick add a quote by Chad Harbach
item.description: "...a soul isn't something a person is born with but something that must be built, by effort and error, study and love." -- Chad Harbach

item.title: Nick add a quote by Denis Johnson
item.description: "I make the road. I draw the map. Nothing just happens to me...I'm the one happening." -- Denis Johnson

item.title: Nick add a quote by Maxine Kumin
item.description: "Cherish your wilderness." -- Maxine Kumin

item.title: Nick add a quote by Ramsey Campbell
item.description: "One way to avoid what has already been done is to be true to yourself." -- Ramsey Campbell
